name: Unum Seclorum
startIntroPart1: When the world crashed into flames, I alone stepped up and gave them an offer - let me bring order, and I will give you a century of peace. In the darkest of times, desperate folk will take desperate measures. In truth, I never bought into the Roman disguise I fed the people one bit. No matter what I did, this land would remain the land of the Founding Fathers. Perhaps they just needed a new coat of paint so the people would continue to believe.
startIntroPart2: But now, the deal of the century is almost up. What do you plan to do now? Will peace last another century? Will you forge a legacy that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your existence is a threat to America. Prepare for war...
attacked: What, you had a death wish?
defeated: And so, dusk comes to America...
introduction: Welcome. I am Imperator Douglas, Commissar of Congress and Defender of the Constitution.
tradeRequest: America's markets remain open. What do you seek?
uniques: All newly-trained [{non-[Civilian]} {non-[Helicopter]} {Land}] units [in capital] receive the [Guardians of the Dream] promotion
